= Lindsey =

Lindsey Kuper was born and raised in Iowa and is one of the world's few remaining actual farmer's daughters.  She podcasts on [http://www.rockstargirl.org Shoebox Full of Tapes], braindumps on [http://lindseykuper.livejournal.com her  blog], and is rumored to be studying computer science at [http://cs.indiana.edu Indiana University].
